description:
Let independently minded pants know who's boss. The Vapor Belt's braided design is infinitely adjustable, and it has just the right amount of stretch.

  • Repreve® recycled polyester fleece is made from plastic bottles
  • Stretchy material is super comfy and does away with finding the perfect hole
  • Premium buckle has a low profile and allows for precise adjustment
  • Metal-free design is great for travel – no need to take it off at the airport
  • Machine washable in case of spillage
name: Arcade Vapor Belt - Unisex
